title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Guest: Curtis Ellis Curtis Ellis has been working in the media for over 20 years, including working as a journalist for... <!--more--> CNN, Andrea Mitchell of NBC News, CBS’s 60 Minutes, and others.
He has been a reporter for the Associated Press, NPR’s All Things Considered and hosted his own syndicated radio talk show.
He has been staunching pro-active in progressive political and social causes after having served as a communications director on Capitol Hill.
Curtis is a member of the American Association of Political Consultants and the American Jobs Alliance which advocates against the increase in further NAFTA-like trade deals that remove jobs from the US.

WEBSITE: www.AmericanJobsAlliance.com
